A

AbstractCubicTransform<Derived extends AbstractCubicTransform> - Class in bigshot
Transforms an image map to a set of rectilinear images.
AbstractCubicTransform() - Constructor for class bigshot.AbstractCubicTransform
Creates a new transform instance.
AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<Derived extends AbstractCubicTransform> - Class in bigshot
Base class for transforms where the transformation to image map space can be expressed in terms of the two angles theta and phi of the sight ray.
AbstractSphericalCubicTransform() - Constructor for class bigshot.AbstractSphericalCubicTransform
Creates a new transform instance.

B

bigshot - package bigshot
Contains classes for image transformation, as well as image pyramid and VR cube generation.
